cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)
mng: heavy, serious, to attach importance to
to repeat, repetition, again, re-, classifier: layer

exm.mng: important point, main point, focus, key (project etc), to focus on, to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election), to re-evaluate
It is important (that) ..., The (important) point is ...
to attach importance to sth, to value
